tool_description: Prioritizes customer feedback based on sentiment analysis results, business rules, and urgency factors to guide action planning.

feedback_items.description: Customer feedback items with sentiment data

prioritization_criteria.description: Criteria for prioritization (sentiment, customer_tier, urgency, impact)

business_hours_only.description: Whether to consider business hours in prioritization

max_priority_items.description: Maximum number of high-priority items to return

error_messages: Empty feedback items: Provide at least 1 feedback item for prioritization.
Invalid prioritization criteria: Use valid criteria like sentiment, customer_tier, urgency, impact.
Customer tier mismatch: Customer tiers array length must match feedback items if provided.
Too many criteria: Maximum 10 prioritization criteria allowed.
Invalid max priority items: Must be between 1 and 100.
usage: Input feedback items with sentiment data and define prioritization criteria. Configure customer tiers and urgency factors. Returns prioritized feedback list with action recommendations.

high_priority_items.description: Highest priority feedback items requiring immediate attention

priority_scores.description: Priority scores for each feedback item

prioritization_summary.description: Summary of prioritization results and next steps
